name: Genre-Confused Room Escape, a Visual Novel
name_original: Genre-Confused Room Escape, a Visual Novel
description:
Completed for My First Game Jam Summer 2017!

Play as Wraith, an up-and-coming superhero as she takes an exam to join the best superhero team in the state! Enter the villain's mind to shut him down, but it's full of surprises...

This game is exactly 1/10th of a room escape, but mostly a The Dating Game style game show. 

It has exactly one sound file, no music, no unique UI, and a severely scaled-down premise, but I did accomplish my ultimate goal: to finish and publish a game. I'm pretty dang proud of myself.

8/6/17: Fixed a couple bugs! You can now start the game without going through the starting scene again, and the text isn't ridiculously slow.
